title: Serif Typeface from a 90's Vinyl Label
author: alande1

comments.content:
Times Extrabold for PATH and RESISTANCE, Times Bold Small Caps for the balance, and a bit of artificial condensing throughout:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/times/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/times/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/times/")
